title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should add Javadoc to the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the view
3. Right-click on the selected field
4. From the context menu, choose 'Add Javadoc'
